name: Fidget Spinner Battle
description:
Play multiplayer Fidget Spinner game!
The first Fidget Spinner concept in the history of io games!
Fight your friend's Fidget Spinner and win a victory!

=== About ===
- Easy manipulation
- Various kinds of Fidget Spinner
- Online combat with many people
- Upgrade to your own style


=== Hint ===
- Collect jewelry to collect gold and upgrade.
- When you accumulate a star and open the box, you wait for a huge reward. (slightly random)
- Even if you are not playing games, I will give you gold!
- Unlike general io games, upgrades are not initialized.
